description: City of New Orleans Parks.  ESRI shapefile format, GIS software required for viewing geometry (http://www.esri.com/software/arcgis/arcreader/).  Tabular data (DBF), included as part of the shapefile, are viewable in Excel.  Update: As Needed

metadata.attribution: City of New Orleans - Department of Information Technology & Innovation

name: NOLA Parks
